item.title: Interesting Things About Kafka
item.description: I work with Kafka a lot and this post is a summary of some interesting internals about it. Topic & Partitions Topic is a logical grouping of partitions. But a partition is the storage unit in Kafka. Producer can decide which partition to publish to by explicitly setting the partition on the message. If producer does not set or sets PartitionAny, round-robin is used starting with an arbitrary partition. offset is maintained per partition and is a monotonically increasing number starting from 0.
